channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description:
I would like to cut areas out of the map so they are isolated? Would this be possible? Like to stop people from being able to go anywhere but the selected areas?So its black around the edges Cheers.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 02:33:19 pm[/size][hr]Bump
